Plot: A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.
Title: Groundhog Day
Writer: Danny Rubin (screenplay), Harold Ramis (screenplay), Danny Rubin (story)
Actors: Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott, Stephen Tobolowsky
tomatoConsensus: Smart, sweet, and inventive, Groundhog Day highlights Murray's dramatic gifts while still leaving plenty of room for laughs.
Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 5 wins & 8 nominations.
